prison.name: Prison
prison.description: Why'd you do that? Look where that got you, stupid.

about.name: Fine details
about.description: We're a little in love with stupidity. We also needed a place to channel that stupidity, and also a playground to test our wits and writing skills. Thus Peezy - Noire was born.

1.name: Red Woman
1.description: A woman - I figure - clamures her way through my office door. 'What a way to enter', I mumble. She's pretty though. Red dress caressing her curves like shrink wrap. I wonder what she wants.

2.name: Crystal
2.description: 'What do you need?' I ask sternly, diverting the mood of the room that was started by her brisk entrance and the way she was walking toward me.'You busy'? She asks, 'Because I have the case that throw you into the Big Leagues'.

about.name: Fine Details
about.descripton: We're just some dudes that wanted to make the dumbest game possible, while having the time of our life learning and writing witty banter. We aren't actually racist.
